extension.summary: Retrospect (previously XBMC Online TV) is a plugin that allows the playback of a lot of TV shows that are available (legally) via the broadcasters websites.
extension.description: Retrospect uses the official websites of a lot of different broadcasting companies (mainly Dutch, Belgian, British and Swedish) to make their re-run episodes available on the Kodi platform. More information can be found at www.rieter.net.[CR][CR]Retrospect reports back usage statistics to our servers. This option can be disabled from the add-on settings.
extension.disclaimer: Retrospect is provided as is. We do not take any responsibility for possible (but highly unlikely) damage cause to your system. Nor do we take responsibility for the content that can be watched via this add-on.

extension.description: This repository allows you to install the most recent version of the Retrospect add-on. They are now included in a single download.

extension.summary: openvpn: a full featured SSL VPN software solution that integrates OpenVPN server capabilities. (XvBMC: version control).
extension.description: openvpn binary is installed as /storage/.kodi/addons/network.openvpn/bin/openvpn (XvBMC: version control '6.0.0 *bump*' -4- Isengard).
extension.disclaimer: this is an unofficial addon. please don't ask for support in openelec forum / irc channel (XvBMC: version control).

extension.description: This is a mod of the Exodus addon. Changes are minimal: just 2 lines removed to regain compatibility with [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR]. Kindly note that Eqsodus is not an official part of the media player you are running, and therefore not to be mentioned within official support channels, this addon has nothing to do with the media player itself, nor it’s intended use, it is simply a third party plugin which has been added to your system.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.

extension.summary: script.module.libtorrent is a Kodi module that makes easy import of python-libtorrent for you.
script.module.libtorrent - модуль Kodi, который упрощает импорт библиотеки python-libtorrent.
extension.license: MIT License

extension.summary: Resolve common live video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi + find links embeded in sites.
Livestreamer extracts streams from various services
extension.description: Livestreamer is a command-line utility that pipes video streams from various services into a video player, such as VLC. The main purpose of Livestreamer is to allow the user to avoid buggy and CPU heavy flash plugins but still be able to enjoy various streamed content. There is also an API available for developers who want access to the video stream data.
extension.license: Simplified BSD

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.

extension.summary: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction
extension.description: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction for hundreds of sites. Version is based on youtube-dl date version: YY.MDD.V where V is the addon specific sub-version. Also provides downloading with the option for background downloading with a queue and queue manager.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Защитава съдържанието на Kodi с PIN код
Προστασία περιεχομένου Kodi με κωδικό PIN
Protect Kodi Content With A Pin Code
Protect Kodi Content With A PIN Code
Protect Kodi Content With A Pin Code
Protéger le contenu de Kodi avec un code PIN
Protéger le contenu de Kodi avec un NIP
להגן על תוכן Kodi באמצעות קוד PIN
Bescherm Kodi inhoud met een PINcode
Umożliwia zabezpieczenie zawartości Kodi przy pomocy kodu PIN.
Proteger o Conteúdo do Kodi com um Código Pin
extension.description: Принуждава потребителите да въвеждат определен PIN код за да им бъде предоставен достъп до посочено съдържание.
Von Anwendern die Eingabe der korrekten PIN für den angegebenen Inhalt erzwingen.
Force users to enter the correct pin code for given content.
Force users to enter the correct pin code for given content.
Force les utilisateurs à saisir le bon code PIN pour un contenu donné.
Forcer les utilisateurs à saisir le bon NIP pour un contenu donné.
특정 콘텐츠에서 PIN 코드 입력을 요구합니다.
Reikalauti vartotojų įvesti teisingą PIN kodą pasirinktam turiniui.
Forceer gebruikers een geldige PIN in te voeren voor gegeven content.
Wymusza na użytkownikach wprowadzenie poprawnego kodu PIN, przez uzyskaniem dostępu do danej zawartości.
Força o usuário a entrar o código Pin correto para lhe dar acesso aos conteúdos.

extension.summary: Configure and manage VPN connections using openVPN
extension.description: Establish a connection to a VPN provider and automatically switch VPN locations based on the add-on being used. Also supports automatic reconnect and connection at boot time. And with some simple configuring (see README and remote.xml file in add-on directory), you can cycle through VPN connections using a remote button.
